title: Resources policy from extraction to innovation: The interplay of minerals, geothermal energy, technological advancements, and ecological footprint in high-ecological footprint economies
content:
Publication date: August 2024

Source: Resources Policy, Volume 95

Author(s): Muhammad Adnan Bashir, Li Qing, Qasim Raza Syed, Anna Barwińska-Małajowicz, Shabir Mohsin Hashmi
